snippet: Reflecting on the evolution of Napa cabernets at a tasting of 20 old vintages of Charles Krug Vintage Selection cabernet sauvignons, from the 1961 to 1991.
lead_paragraph: Reflecting on the evolution of Napa cabernets at a tasting of 20 old vintages of Charles Krug Vintage Selection cabernet sauvignons, from the 1961 to 1991.
